channel.title: Earnings surprises on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Earnings surprises on FinanClub

item.title: SWN
item.description: score:-91 Chances: Higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases have positively impacted Southwestern Energy’s Q4 earnings. Longer-term bull case for natural gas rests on expanding U.S. exports, benefiting companies like Chesapeake Energy and Cheniere Energy. Southwestern Energy delivered earnings and revenue surprises for the quarter ended December 2023, indicating a strong performance.

item.title: YMM
item.description: score:40 Chances: Full Truck Alliance’s stock price might be vulnerable due to the large stake held by institutions. The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 40.2% in Full Truck Alliance Co. Ltd. Sponsored ADR (YMM).
